Today in Moray, it's looking good with 3 ft @ 8s E swell and a moderate 11 mph S wind. Fraserburgh and West Point are your top picks, both offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 1 ft @ 7s ENE, making it a poor day for surf. Day after, conditions improve again with 3 ft @ 8s E swell and light 9 mph S winds, making it a solid option at spots like Fraserburgh and Pennan. Best: today.
